commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Good work, Ayumu!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* *Huff* How... How was it?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Can't you tell from the cheers of the audience? It was a huge success!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thanks! I feel fantastic!

commands.select_args: ||I've never seen a show like that!|| select_1
||It looked like a lot of fun!|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I don't think I've ever seen a show like that!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah! I still feel like I'm floating from the adrenaline. It's like I can still hear everyone's voices.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You looked like you had a lot of fun!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It was so much fun!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm so happy for you! You really did a great job, Ayumu!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It was awesome!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* You seem more fired up than usual.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's 'cause I'm proud enough of my live show performance to boast about it to you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: At my last solo event, it took all that I had to get my message across, but today, I felt like I was able to carry a conversation on stage with my audience.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Maybe I still have a ways to go compared to other girls, but it feels like I'm growing bit by bit.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You know yourself well and work extremely hard to make up for what you lack. It's only natural for you to grow and improve.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Really?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You don't believe me even though I've watched all your hard work from up close?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Not at all! I believe you more than anybody else!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm sure you'll continue to grow from here on out.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Maybe one day I'll become a school idol that you and my fans can be proud of.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Just a "maybe"? You don't mean that you will?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You're right, I will!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's the spirit!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I love being a school idol more than ever before. I'll become a school idol who has even more fun times with her fans!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I don't doubt you. I'm sure everyone cheering for you knows this, too.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yup. I'm gonna do my best. So... Will you continue to stay by my side and support me?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* I feel like you eventually won't need my support.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Th-That's not true! I need you! Forever!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm happy to hear that. And of course, I'll always cheer for you as you give it your all as a school idol!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thank you! Stay by my side and continue watching over me, please!
